public ref class SkipLocalsInitAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Module | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, Inherited=false)]

[<System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Module | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Struct, Inherited=false)>]

summary.span: 向编译器指示在发出元数据时，不应在嵌套的方法标头中设置 .locals init 标志。

span.span: Indicates to the compiler that the .locals init flag should not be set in nested method headers when emitting to metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是不安全的，因为它可能会在某些实例中将未初始化的内存显示到应用程序中 (例如，从未初始化的堆栈分配内存) 读取。This attribute is unsafe, because it may reveal uninitialized memory to the application in certain instances (for example, reading from uninitialized stack-allocated memory). 如果直接应用于方法，该特性将应用于该方法及其所有嵌套函数，包括 lambda 和局部函数。If applied to a method directly, the attribute applies to that method and all its nested functions, including lambdas and local functions. 如果应用于类型或模块，则它将应用于嵌套在内的所有方法。If applied to a type or module, it applies to all methods nested inside. 对于程序集，不允许使用此特性。This attribute is intentionally not permitted on assemblies. 若要将属性应用于多个类型声明，请改用模块级别的。To apply the attribute to multiple type declarations, use it at the module level instead.
